data.name: Pavlov VR
data.detailed_description:
Pavlov is a multiplayer shooter for the HTC Vive.

Features

  • Dedicated Servers
  • Competitive Search And Destroy game mode
  • Casual fast-paced game modes
  • Bots
  • Matchmaking
  • Offline/Practice mode
  • Voice Chat
  • Touchpad and OOB locomotion

OOB Locomotion

OOB stands for "out of body", a teleport variation without actually teleporting, your "avatar" moves into the target location while you snap every half a second to it. This works great for people who are prone to motion sickness without breaking the game for other people, this means you can play with regular players.

OOB Locomotion

OOB stands for "out of body", a teleport variation without actually teleporting, your "avatar" moves into the target location while you snap every half a second to it. This works great for people who are prone to motion sickness without breaking the game for other people, this means you can play with regular players.
data.short_description: Pavlov is a multiplayer shooter for the HTC Vive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core 3 Ghz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core 3 Ghz +
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 ti or GTX 1070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
